executive_summary.headline: Day 8: P0/P1 STRESS Regime Ontology Repair + Task Scheduler Infrastructure Fix
executive_summary.main_conclusion: Five major accomplishments: (1) P0/P1 STRESS Regime Ontology Repair - fixed 0% hit rate on 75 predictions via calibration gates (ceiling 0.50), identity mappings for BROKEN/VND, and runtime cap. Migrations 249+250 applied, git 19027c0 pushed. (2) Task Scheduler Python path - fixed with short path (RJANSK~1). (3) Cycle timing - rescheduled to 00:30 UTC Jan 16. (4) Outcome data gap - ios003 generated 490 compliant outcomes. (5) Unicode path corruption - 10 Python tasks recreated with SYSTEM account. Pre-flight verification passed 15/15 checks. Infrastructure 100% operational.

morning_event.summary: Manual Cycle 1 execution at 07:19 UTC resulted in COVERAGE_FAIL (0 eligible forecasts)
morning_event.root_cause: 24h REGIME forecasts expire at 23:00 UTC tonight - not yet evaluable
morning_event.daemon_behavior: CORRECT - properly detected no eligible forecasts

afternoon_fixes.task_scheduler_fix: Changed Python path from relative to short path (RJANSK~1) to avoid Unicode encoding issues
afternoon_fixes.verification: Test run confirmed Task Scheduler now executes daemon correctly
afternoon_fixes.ready_status: All blockers cleared - ready for tonight

evening_verification.summary: Comprehensive verification of all Cycle 1 components completed successfully
evening_verification.critical_discovery: Outcome gap identified and resolved - ios003 generated 490 outcomes

late_evening_fix.issue: Multiple FHQ Python tasks had Unicode path corruption or relative paths
late_evening_fix.symptoms: SPY, QQQ, EURUSD=X stale for 42+ hours despite scheduled tasks showing 'Ready'
late_evening_fix.root_cause: Windows Task Scheduler stored corrupted Unicode path (Ørjan → encoded characters) affecting all Python tasks
late_evening_fix.fix_applied: Full audit of all FHQ tasks - recreated 10 Python tasks with SYSTEM account and short path (RJANSK~1)

account_lockout_resolved.issue: Initial fix attempts caused Windows account lockout due to stored credentials
account_lockout_resolved.solution: Recreated all tasks with SYSTEM account - no password required, no lockout risk

late_evening_fix.verification: All 10 Python tasks verified with correct RJANSK~1 short path

strategic_value.system_maturity: Infrastructure for autonomous verification (Pillar 1-3) is 92% complete
strategic_value.learning_progression: Ready for Cycle 1 execution tonight (after 00:00 UTC Jan 16)
strategic_value.failure_protocol_validated: Daemon correctly failed and blocked retry per CEO directive

section_1_system_development.title: SYSTEMUTVIKLING (Maskineriet)
section_1_system_development.description: Development of technical frameworks, databases and engines (STIG/LINE focus)

pillar_1_autonomous_scheduler.description: Windows Task Scheduler operates independently of prediction engine to ensure neutral measurement

issue_discovered.root_cause: Task used relative 'python' path; SYSTEM context lacks user PATH; Unicode char in path corrupted

pillar_1_autonomous_scheduler.verification: Test run returned exit code 1 (daemon executed, failed on coverage as expected)

pillar_2_database_horizon.description: Migration 248 has integrated system clock directly into Stillness protocol
pillar_2_database_horizon.so_what: We eliminate temporal drift anomalies that previously disturbed results

pillar_3_stillness_enforcement.description: Automatic triggers in fhq_governance now block all unauthorized parameter changes

section_2_learning_evolution.title: LÆRINGENS EVOLUSJON (Intelligensen)
section_2_learning_evolution.description: Development of system understanding, prediction capability and calibration (FINN/LARS focus)

epistemic_progression.statistical_significance: Provides statistically significant foundation for assessing Alpha capacity

continuous_operations.description: FjordHQ runs continuous learning operations 24/7 under Stillness Protocol

calibration_trend.interpretation: Brier improving (lower is better). Delta negative = improvement.
calibration_trend.contextualized_interpretation: Observed Brier values indicate improvement relative to baseline (0.5158). This improvement is PRELIMINARY and must be confirmed through stability over at least two independent cycles before it can be classified as learning.
calibration_trend.warning: Single-cycle results cannot be interpreted as learning. Awaiting Cycle 2 for stability proof.

section_2_learning_evolution.target: We seek evidence that this improvement is stable across multiple cycles, not just a lucky outcome of market conditions

risks.risk: Low coverage in Cycle 1 due to market stagnation
risks.mitigation: ADR-024 allows extension of LDOW window if coverage falls below 80%, without breaking Stillness protocol

next_steps.tonight: Execute Cycle 1 after 00:30 UTC Jan 16 (01:30 CET) when forecasts are eligible
next_steps.attestation: VEGA must sign for measurement validity immediately after completion
next_steps.evaluation: Comparison of System Readiness vs Learning Stability for Day 9 preparation

root_cause_analysis.summary: Cycle 1 scheduled 21 hours before any forecasts would be eligible
root_cause_analysis.daemon_behavior: CORRECT - correctly detected 0 eligible forecasts and failed per protocol

timing_explanation.why_zero_eligible: 24h REGIME forecasts created at 23:00 UTC expire 24h later. Current unresolved forecasts expire at 23:00 UTC tonight.

incident_2.note: Test run after Task Scheduler fix

cycle_1_execution.stillness_impact: NONE - This failure does NOT violate Stillness. Scheduling error discovered through correct operation.

correction_a.original: validere den første bølgen av autonom læring
correction_a.corrected: validere den første fullførte læringssyklusen under Stillness, som forutsetning for autonomi
correction_a.rationale: Autonomous learning is not activated until Rung D. Day 8 = observed learning signal, not autonomous learning.

correction_b.corrected: Observed Brier values indicate significant improvement relative to baseline. This improvement is PRELIMINARY and must be confirmed through stability over at least two independent cycles before it can be classified as learning.
correction_b.rationale: Avoids single-cycle bias. Protects against 'lucky regime' argument. 100% aligned with Murphy & Winkler / Gneiting & Raftery.

do: Let scheduler and database do the job
Let VEGA sign what actually happens
mini_directive.key_insight: You have done the hardest thing already: you have refrained from intervening. That is exactly why this will work.

ceo_decision.action: Run Cycle 1 manually tonight after midnight UTC (around 00:30 UTC Jan 16)
ceo_decision.rationale: Stays on original track without delay

attestation.philosophy: ELIMINATE NOISE. GENERATE SIGNAL. TRUST THE LADDER.
attestation.morning_attestation: Root cause analysis complete. Daemon is functioning correctly. Scheduling error identified and documented. Stillness preserved.
attestation.afternoon_attestation: Task Scheduler fixed (short path). Both failure incidents resolved. Retry authorized. System verified working.
attestation.evening_attestation: Pre-flight verification completed. 15/15 checks passed. Critical outcome gap discovered and resolved via ios003. 490 CEO-DIR-2026-020 compliant outcomes generated. 100% forecast coverage achieved (66/66). All systems verified operational.
attestation.late_evening_attestation: Comprehensive Task Scheduler audit completed. Telegram alert revealed widespread Unicode path corruption affecting all Python tasks. Full remediation: 10 tasks recreated with SYSTEM account and short path (RJANSK~1), 3 duplicate tasks deleted. All price ingest, regime, governance, and LDOW tasks verified operational. Price freshness restored (19.6h). Infrastructure 100% operational for tonight's Cycle 1.
attestation.ceo_decision_recorded: Option A confirmed - manual Cycle 1 execution tonight after 00:00 UTC Jan 16
attestation.verification_confidence: HIGH - All components tested and data availability confirmed

outcome_availability.root_cause: ios010 blocked by CEO-DIR-2026-020 contamination trigger

brier_score_metrics.title: BRIER SCORE & CALIBRATION METRICS
brier_score_metrics.description: What we are learning to measure - probabilistic forecast accuracy
brier_score_metrics.key_insight: BEAR regime has best Brier (0.4939) and highest hit rate (33.8%). BULL has worst Brier (0.6456) with overconfidence.

damper_effectiveness.interpretation: Damper reduces overconfidence by ~26 percentage points

baseline_comparison.warning: Improvements are PRELIMINARY. ADR-024 requires 2 completed cycles.

p0p1_regime_ontology_repair.title: P0/P1 STRESS REGIME ONTOLOGY REPAIR

problem_statement.issue: STRESS regime has 0% hit rate on 75 predictions despite 87% average confidence
problem_statement.root_cause: Definition mismatch - forecast uses fragility/VIX (macro signal), outcome uses vol_ratio (price signal)
problem_statement.impact: Systematic overconfidence corrupting calibration metrics and downstream decisions

snapshots.regime_scalar_config: 11 regimes, VOLATILE_NON_DIRECTIONAL missing, STRESS not in config
snapshots.regime_v2_to_v4_mapping: 9 mappings, 2 incorrectly map to STRESS (BROKEN, VND)

changes: Confidence ceiling set to 0.50 for both gates

code_change.logging: P0 STRESS FREEZE warning when cap applied

changes: Extended regime_v2_to_v4_mapping with 8 new columns (definitions, equivalence, downstream contracts)
Populated definitions and downstream contracts for all 9 regimes

git_commit.message: fix(regime): P0/P1 STRESS regime ontology repair

ios003_verification_run.note: Cap not exercised because assets were already CURRENT from pre-migration run. Cap will apply on next new STRESS classification.

learnings: Definition mismatch between forecast and outcome can cause systematic overconfidence
Calibration gates provide database-level enforcement independent of code
Identity mappings preserve original semantics while fixing incorrect aggregations
Evidence chain (baseline -> migration -> completion) enables court-proof verification
